document.full_text: a jury found a police officer's 'excessive and unreasonable' behavior during sometimes violent protests surrounding the group of 20 meeting in 2009 led to the death of ian tomlinson.
document.title: inquest faults london officer in 2009 death during protests
lines_and_colors: a jury found a police officer's 'excessive and unreasonable' behavior during sometimes violent protests surrounding the group of 20 meeting in 2009 led to the death of ian tomlinson.
